author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
SAND & BONE is the first REALM expansion for Warhammer: Age of Sigmar's Spearhead game format. The Cities of Sigmar get their second brand new Spearhead in this box. Let's check it out!

Thanks to GW for the copy of the Sand & Bone Box to review. 

#AdWIP
#NewAOS
#WarhammerCommunity

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Freshly fled from the AGE OF SIGMAR and back to the OLD WORLD THAT WAS... the Brayherds have safely landed in new Blue Boxes back to the loving arms of the Warhammer Community. WHY COULDN'T THESE OLD METALS HAVE COME BACK? They brought back the old Dryads... why not the Minotaurs? WHY DO YOU HAVE TO DO ME LIKE THAT? 

It's fine. Let's check these guys out. 

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

#AdWIP

#BeastmenBrayherds

#WarhammerCommunity 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames

title: GMG Reviews - Warhammer: The Old World - Arcane Journal Beastmen by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
It's the NEW FORMAT 2025-26 Warhammer General's Handbook that comes complete with all the ACCESSORIES you need to bolt onto the CORE RULES of Warhammer to make it MATCH for PLAY. You ready? You gonna download the Peter Griffin Skin for your Ogor Tyrant? Maybe DOJA CAT will be OC 10 this Season. Let's GOOOOO. 

Thanks to Games Workshop for the complimentary copy of the box to review. 

#AdWIP

#AoS
